BankDetails.description: For billing deal only. For invoice and payment transaction use <see cref="T:Shared.Integration.Models.PaymentDetails.BankTransferDetails"></see>

creditCardToken.description: Stored credit card details token (should be omitted in case if full credit card details used)

billingDealTimestamp.description: Date-time when deal created initially in UTC

currentTransactionTimestamp.description: Date-time when last created initially in UTC

nextScheduledTransaction.description: Date-time when next transaction should be generated

currentTransactionTimestamp.description: Date-time when last created initially in UTC

creditCardToken.description: Stored credit card details token (should be omitted in case if full credit card details used)

creditCardToken.description: Stored credit card details token (should be omitted in case if full credit card details used)

CardPresenceEnum.description:
Is the card physically scanned

cardNotPresent

regular

creditCardToken.description: Stored credit card details token (should be omitted in case if full credit card details used)

CheckCreditCardRequest.description: Check if credit card is valid

creditCardToken.description: Stored credit card details token (should be omitted in case if full credit card details used)

transactionAmount.description: Transaction amount. Must always be specified. In case of Installments must match InstallmentDetails.TotalAmount

saveCreditCard.description:
Save credit card from request.
Requires Feature CreditCardTokens to be enabled.

pinPadDeviceID.description: Pinpad device in case of terminal with multiple devices

cardOwnerNationalID.description: Only to be used for pin pad transactions when CreditCardSecureDetails is not available

cardOwnerName.description: Only to be used for pin pad transactions when CreditCardSecureDetails is not available

CreateTransactionRequest.description: Create the charge based on credit card or previously stored credit card token

CreditCardDetails.description: Does not store full card number. Used 123456****1234 pattern

authNum.description: after code 3 or 4 user can insert this value from credit company

dealDescription.description: Deal description. In case of generating payment link, these description will be displayed on Checkout Page

consumerID.description: End-customer record UUId in EasyCard system

consumerExternalReference.description: External system consumer identifier for example RapidOne customer code

DealDetails.description: Additional deal information. All these data are not required and used only for merchant's business purposes.

DocumentOriginEnum.description:
Document origin (primarely payment transaction origin)

UI (Document created manually by merchant user using Merchant's UI)

API (Document created via API)

checkout (Document created by consumer using Checkout Page)

billing (Document generated based on billing schedule)

device (Transaction created using pinpad device (or other device))

paymentRequest (Document created by consumer using Checkout Page with a payment link)

bit (Document created by consumer using Bit)
x-enumDescriptions: Document created manually by merchant user using Merchant's UI
Document created by consumer using Checkout Page
Document generated based on billing schedule
Transaction created using pinpad device (or other device)
Document created by consumer using Checkout Page with a payment link
Document created by consumer using Bit

JDealTypeEnum.description:
Type of Deal. optional values are; J2 for Check,J4 for Charge, J5 for Block card

J4 (Regular deal)

J2 (Check)

J5 (Block card)

paymentRequestAmount.description: Deal amount including VAT. This amount will be displayed on Checkout Page. Consumer can override this amount in case if UserAmount flag specified.

issueInvoice.description: Create document - Invoice, Receipt etc. If omitted, default terminal settings will be used

allowPinPad.description: Enables PinPad button on checkout page

vatRate.description: Deal tax rate. Can be omitted if only PaymentRequestAmount specified - in this case VAT rate from terminal settings will be used

vatTotal.description: Total deal tax amount. VATTotal = NetTotal * VATRate. Can be omitted if only PaymentRequestAmount specified

netTotal.description: Deal amount before tax. PaymentRequestAmount = NetTotal + VATTotal. Can be omitted if only PaymentRequestAmount specified

requestSubject.description: You can override default email subject When sending payment link via email

fromAddress.description: You can override "from" address subject When sending payment link via email

isRefund.description: Generate link to Checkout Page to create refund

redirectUrl.description: Url to merchant's web site. Base url should be configured in terminal settings. You can add any details to query string.

extension.description: Any advanced payload which will be stored in EasyCard and then can be obtained using "GetTransaction"

language.description: Default language to display checkout page

PaymentRequestCreate.description: Create a link to Checkout Page

PaymentRequestOperationCodesEnum.description:
PaymentRequestCreated

PaymentRequestUpdated

PaymentRequestSent

PaymentRequestCanceled

PaymentRequestViewed

PaymentRequestRejected

PaymentRequestPaymentFailed

PaymentRequestPayed

paymentRequestTimestamp.description: Date-time when deal created initially in UTC

numberOfPayments.description: Number Of payments (cannot be more than 999)

sending

sent

viewed

sendingFailed

transactionTimestamp.description: Date-time when transaction created initially in UTC

transactionJ5ExpiredDate.description: Transaction J5 expired date (in gengeral after 1 day)

creditCardToken.description: Stored credit card details token reference

billingDealID.description: Reference to billing schedule which produced this transaction

rejectionMessage.description: Rejection Reason Message (in case of rejected transaction)

vatTotal.description: Total deal tax amount. VATTotal = NetTotal * VATRate

netTotal.description: Deal amount before tax. PaymentRequestAmount = NetTotal + VATTotal

consumerIP.description: We can know it from checkout page activity

paymentRequestID.description: Reference to initial payment link creation request

extension.description: Any advanced payload which will be stored in EasyCard and then can be obtained using "GetTransaction"

allowTransmissionCancellation.description: Transaction transmission cannot be canceled manually

allowInvoiceCreation.description: Invoice can be created for this transaction
